sentences.en: Abigail the mother of Amasa , whose father was Jether the Ishmaelite.
sentences.cn: 耶拉篾又娶一妻名叫亚她拉,是阿南的母亲.

sentences.en: Abigail The score was fantastic too. It really added the action.
sentences.cn: 阿比盖尔:配乐也好得很, 使剧情更为生色.

sentences.en: Abigail was a prophet in the Book of Samuel.
sentences.cn: 艾比盖尔是《母尔记》中的一位预言家.

sentences.en: Abigail: Fantastic. I heard a couple of the tracks on the radio yesterday. They were amazing.
sentences.cn: 艾比盖尔: 好啊. 我昨天在收音机上听到其中几首歌, 非常好听.

sentences.en: Abigail: How much did she win?
sentences.cn: 艾比盖尔: 她赢了多少钱?

sentences.en: Abigail: Well, it was very difficult. I did not know it, did you?
sentences.cn: 艾比盖尔: 那个问题很难回答. 我就不知道答案, 你 呢 ?

sentences.en: Amos Bronson Alcott married Abigail May on May 23, 1830.
sentences.cn: 爱默斯?布朗森?爱尔考特在1830年5月23日娶了艾碧该?梅为妻.

sentences.en: And David sent and proposed to Abigail, to take her as his wife.
sentences.cn: 于是大卫打发人去,与亚比该说, 要娶他为妻.

sentences.en: And David's two wives were and Abigail the wife of Nabal the Carmelite.
sentences.cn: 5大卫的两个妻―耶斯列人亚希暖和作过拿八妻的迦密人亚比该,也被掳去了.

sentences.en: And David's two wives were, Ahinoam the Jezreelitess, and Abigail the wife of Nabal the Carmelite.
sentences.cn: 5大卫的两个妻─耶斯列人亚希暖和作过拿八妻的迦密人亚比该, 也被掳去了.

sentences.en: As wife of the first Vice President, Abigail became a good friend to Mrs. Washington and a valued help in official entertaining, drawing on her experience of courts and society abroad.
sentences.cn: 作为第一副总统夫人，阿比盖尔成为华盛顿夫人要好的朋友，依靠她在法院和国外的生活经验，对于官方娱乐活动提供了有益的帮助。

sentences.en: Cindy: Hi, is that you Abigail? Can you come over?
sentences.cn: 辛迪: 喂, 是艾比盖尔 吗 ?你可以到我家来 吗 ?

sentences.en: He complained to his wife Abigail, "My country has in its wisdom contrived for me the most insignificant office that ever the invention of man contrived or his imagination conceived.
sentences.cn: 他曾对他的妻子阿比盖尔抱怨，“我们的国家自做聪明，拿那个最不起眼的职位给我，可能就是某个人即兴杰作或者是他的想象。”

sentences.en: I received a prize from Abigail . Can I still get a prize from AAA?
sentences.cn: 我收到了阿碧洁尔的奖品. 我还可以从AAA那儿赢取奖品 吗 ?

sentences.en: In that case, you must come along with Abigail and Jessica to Thanksgiving.
sentences.cn: 如果是这样的话, 你必须同艾比盖尔和杰茜一起来过感恩节.

sentences.en: Joel Siegel: Catherine Zeta - Jones and Abigail Breslin star in No Reservations.
sentences.cn: 乔-西格: 凯瑟琳·泽塔 -琼斯 以及阿比盖尔·布兰斯林《美味关系》中担当主角.

sentences.en: Like other women of the time, Abigail lacked formal education; but her curiosity spurred her keen intelligence, and she read avidly the books at hand.
sentences.cn: 与同时代其他的妇女一样，阿比盖尔缺乏正式的教育。 但是她的好奇心使她生性聪敏。

sentences.en: Pauline Friedman took the name Abigail from the Christian Bible Old Testa - ment.
sentences.cn: 波林·弗里德曼的笔名艾比盖尔取自《圣经·旧约》.

trans.tran_en: the woman who brought provisions to David and his followers and subsequently became his wife (I Samuel 25:1–42)
